text: Yara imana eneche tadera hrdaya ki allahara smarane ebam ye satya nayila hayeche tara jan'ya bigalita ha'oyara samaya aseni [1]? Ara tara yena tadera mata na haya yaderake age kitaba deya hayechila --- arahpara bahu kala atikranta ha'oyara para tadera antarasamuha kathina haye parechila. Ara tadera adhikansa'i phasika
